title: 15: S5E15 – "Bait and Switch" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales from authors Michael Paige, N.M. Brown, Devin Langan, and Stanley B. Webb, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about delicious deception, repairs gone wrong, wintry wrecks, and treacherous torrents.


Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
